title: Luckie – These Days
content:
Haven’t been stopped in my tracks by many new artists this year, but this second track from London’s (Tottenham to be precise) Luckie really did it for me.

Raw yet with a restrained elegance, These Days combines classic pop balladry with startlingly honest lyricism – this is an ode to feeling lost and dated in a world that changes quicker than we can keep up with; and it’s downright beautiful. Check it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
